card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Forgotten Lore
card.property: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.

card.name: Fungal Bloom
card.property: {G} {G}: Put a spore counter on target Fungus.

card.name: Fyndhorn Pollen
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) All creatures get -1/-0. {1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Johtull Wurm
card.property: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

card.name: Joven's Ferrets
card.property: Whenever Joven's Ferrets attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn. At end of combat, tap all creatures that blocked Joven's Ferrets this turn. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Kaysa
card.property: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Leaping Lizard
card.property: {1} {G}: Leaping Lizard gets -0/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Nature's Wrath
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nature's Wrath unless you pay {G}. Whenever a player puts an Island or blue permanent onto the battlefield, that player sacrifices an Island or blue permanent of their choice. Whenever a player puts a Swamp or black permanent onto the battlefield, that player sacrifices a Swamp or black permanent of their choice.

card.name: Night Soil
card.property: {1}, Exile two creature cards from a single graveyard: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Ritual of Subdual
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.

card.name: Shrink
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Spore Cloud
card.property: Tap all blocking creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature and each blocking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Spore Flower
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Spore Flower. Remove three spore counters from Spore Flower: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Stampede
card.property: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Stunted Growth
card.property: Target player chooses three cards from their hand and puts them on top of their library in any order.

card.name: Thallid
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid. Remove three spore counters from Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

card.name: Thallid Devourer
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Devourer. Remove three spore counters from Thallid Devourer: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Sacrifice a Saproling: Thallid Devourer gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Thelonite Druid
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Forests you control become 2/3 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.

card.name: Thermokarst
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Tinder Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

card.name: Whiteout
card.property: All creatures lose flying until end of turn. Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wiitigo
card.property: Wiitigo enters with six +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Wiitigo if it has blocked or been blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Wolf Pack
card.property: You may have Wolf Pack assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Woolly Mammoths
card.property: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.

card.name: Woolly Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Yavimaya Ancients
card.property: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Diabolic Vision
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Earthlink
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Earthlink unless you pay {2}. Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land of their choice.

card.name: Elemental Augury
card.property: {3}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Fumarole
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 3 life. Destroy target creature and target land.

card.name: Giant Trap Door Spider
Nature's Blessing
card.property: {G} {W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely. Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

card.name: Skeleton Ship
card.property: When you control no Islands, sacrifice Skeleton Ship. {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Storm Spirit
card.property: Flying {T}: Storm Spirit deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Wings of Aesthir
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.

card.name: Winter's Night
card.property: Whenever a player taps a snow land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Adarkar Sentinel
card.property: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Aeolipile
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Aeolipile: It deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Ashnod's Cylix
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player looks at the top three cards of their library, puts one of them back on top of their library, then exiles the rest.

card.name: Barbed Sextant
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Clockwork Steed
card.property: Clockwork Steed enters with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Steed can't be blocked by artifact creatures. At end of combat, if Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

card.name: Despotic Scepter
card.property: {T}: Destroy target permanent you own. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Elkin Bottle
card.property: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

card.name: Elven Lyre
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Elven Lyre: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Gustha's Scepter
card.property: {T}: Exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled. {T}: Return a card you own exiled with Gustha's Scepter to your hand. When you lose control of Gustha's Scepter, put all cards exiled with Gustha's Scepter into their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Helm of Obedience
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target opponent mills a card, then repeats this process until a creature card or X cards have been put into their graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If one or more creature cards were put into that graveyard this way, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put one of them onto the battlefield under your control. X can't be 0.

card.name: Jester's Mask
card.property: Jester's Mask enters tapped. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Mask: Target opponent puts the cards from their hand on top of their library. Search that player's library for that many cards. That player puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles.

card.name: Jeweled Amulet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Jeweled Amulet. Note the type of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate only if there are no charge counters on Jeweled Amulet. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Jeweled Amulet: Add one mana of Jeweled Amulet's last noted type.

card.name: Lodestone Bauble
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Lodestone Bauble: Put up to four target basic land cards from a player's graveyard on top of their library in any order. That player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Mana Crypt
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Mishra's Groundbreaker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Groundbreaker: Target land becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Phyrexian Devourer
card.property: When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it. Exile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's mana value.

card.name: Phyrexian Portal
card.property: {3}: If your library has ten or more cards in it, target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library.

card.name: Roterothopter
card.property: Flying {2}: Roterothopter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate no more than twice each turn.

card.name: Skull Catapult
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skull Catapult deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Snow Fortress
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}: Snow Fortress gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {1}: Snow Fortress gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {3}: Snow Fortress deals 1 damage to target creature without flying that's attacking you.

card.name: Soldevi Digger
card.property: {2}: Put the top card of your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Soldevi Simulacrum
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {1}: Soldevi Simulacrum gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Time Bomb
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on Time Bomb. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Time Bomb: Time Bomb deals damage equal to the number of time counters on it to each creature and each player.

card.name: Whirling Catapult
card.property: {2}, Exile the top two cards of your library: Whirling Catapult deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

card.name: Badlands
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)

card.name: Balduvian Trading Post
card.property: If Balduvian Trading Post would enter, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{R}. {1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Dwarven Ruins
card.property: Dwarven Ruins enters tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {T}, Sacrifice Dwarven Ruins: Add {R}{R}.

card.name: Ebon Stronghold
card.property: Ebon Stronghold enters tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice Ebon Stronghold: Add {B}{B}.

card.name: Glacial Chasm
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Glacial Chasm enters, sacrifice a land. Creatures you control can't attack. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Havenwood Battleground
card.property: Havenwood Battleground enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}, Sacrifice Havenwood Battleground: Add {G}{G}.

card.name: Heart of Yavimaya
card.property: If Heart of Yavimaya would enter, sacrifice a Forest instead. If you do, put Heart of Yavimaya onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ice Floe
card.property: You may choose not to untap Ice Floe during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature without flying that's attacking you. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Ice Floe remains tapped.

card.name: Kjeldoran Outpost
card.property: If Kjeldoran Outpost would enter, sacrifice a Plains instead. If you do, put Kjeldoran Outpost onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {W}. {1}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Ruins of Trokair
card.property: Ruins of Trokair enters tapped. {T}: Add {W}. {T}, Sacrifice Ruins of Trokair: Add {W}{W}.

card.name: Savannah
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

card.name: Soldevi Excavations
card.property: If Soldevi Excavations would enter, sacrifice an untapped Island instead. If you do, put Soldevi Excavations onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{U}. {1}, {T}: Scry 1.

card.name: Svyelunite Temple
card.property: Svyelunite Temple enters tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {T}, Sacrifice Svyelunite Temple: Add {U}{U}.
